quest.name: A Million Malms Away
journal:
Dreamingway is contemplatively eyeing the remaining open space in Hoper's Hold.
※The difficulty of this quest will be synced to your current level.

Dreamingway summons you to a meeting of minds, intent on dreaming up a station that can revive the ashen-furred Loporrit's zest for life. You settle on an idea that would allow them to communicate with the people of Etheirys regardless of distance─radio. As you have only ever been on the listening end of such devices, however, the technical requirements will need to be gleaned from experts before you can set to work. In the meanwhile, Dreamingway asks that you accompany him to tempt no-longer-Counselingway with word of the project.

You and Dreamingway find the ashen-furred Loporrit in their usual spot, gazing at the faraway Etheirys. The mention of radio prompts the lengthiest proclamation you've heard from them thus far, revealing that they maintain a keen interest in being of the utmost aid to mankind. Whether they will follow through on their stated intent to provide additional input on programming remains to be seen, but it appears you have at least piqued their interest...

Back in Hoper's Hold, you consult Dreamingway and Managingway about the equipment required for creating radio transmissions. Though the instructions are somewhat unclear, your craftsman's competence has carried you through thus far, and there is no reason to believe it shall not do so again.

You present the necessary equipment─probably─to Dreamingway, and the broadcasting station is created with minimal incident. With some encouragement, the ashen-furred Loporrit is persuaded to voice the inaugural broadcast, transmitting a message of newfound hope to people across Etheirys. Are you listening?

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Could you join us for a moment, Forename?

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: My survey of Bestways Burrow morale indicates that the situation is as we suspected─though our efforts have reached the majority of wayward Ways, a few yet remain in the doldrums.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: The erstwhile Counselingway first among them, of course.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: I've stretched my imagination ever so hard for dreams that might inspire them, but nothing concrete has come to mind...

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: I propose that we examine the issue of their personal motivation more closely. Per Livingway, they were once passionate about their work, after all.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: We cannot change the fact that the people of Etheirys won't be coming to live on the moon, but reaching out to them is hardly beyond our means.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: There is naught stopping us from utilizing our ashen-furred associate's communication skills to aid mankind, albeit remotely.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Thus making their old dream their new dream... But what sort of station would be suitable?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: One for sharing useful information with the people of Etheirys.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Perhaps a station that individuals could contact with questions?

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Your people's ears aren't very large, though. How could they hear what's being said?

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: That would be quite similar to not-Counselingway's previous job. How would people contact us, though?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: You might use one of those Garlean “radios”─so long as you refrain from any mind-bending schemes.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Everyone and their minion seems quite happy to call me via linkpearl.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: "Schemes“ sound bad, but ”radio“ sounds intriguing! Tell me more...

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: ...And you can truly hear distant voices through the tiny box? Incredible!

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Linkpearls! I had entirely forgotten. That would have made finding you on Etheirys a lot easier...

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Unfortunately, to purchase dedicated linkpearls for the entire population of the star would be stretching our budget rather thin. To say naught of the nightmarish logistics of distribution...

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Aw...

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: We simply must find a way to transmit to these radios. For science!

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Eyes on the project objectives, please. That said, I quite agree.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: If Garlemald has such technology, it is likely that the Sharlayans have studied it, if not invented similar devices of their own.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: If so, they may have shared its secrets with Livingway. No doubt Inventingway will have thoughts on the matter as well...

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: I leave the technical details in your capable paws, Managingway. In the meanwhile, I should like to have a chat with the Loporrit formally known as Counselingway...

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Please join me in inviting them to join us!

dialogue.name: TALKINGWAY
dialogue.text: You again, I see.

dialogue.name: TALKINGWAY
dialogue.text: You want me to assist the people of Etheirys...remotely?

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Construction of the station is underway as we speak. Using the magic known as “radio,” we can transmit all manner of noises across space and...darker space!

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: For instance...music! Goodness, we could share my music, couldn't we?

dialogue.name: TALKINGWAY
dialogue.text: Do not bother the people of Etheirys with that noisome beeping.

dialogue.name: TALKINGWAY
dialogue.text: If we are to employ this station of yours, surely there are myriad better uses.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Better than music?

dialogue.name: TALKINGWAY
dialogue.text: If you ask me...

dialogue.name: TALKINGWAY
dialogue.text: Many of Etheirys's people lost loved ones during the Final Days, did they not? We could let them know that they're not alone.

dialogue.name: TALKINGWAY
dialogue.text: Or─purely as an example, you understand─we could use our unique vantage point to describe cloud formations.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Oooh... I don't follow!

dialogue.name: TALKINGWAY
dialogue.text: <sigh> With that information, those on the ground could more accurately predict incoming storms, forestalling ill-fated forays.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: You truly are an expert in helpfulness! Those things never would have occurred to me.

dialogue.name: TALKINGWAY
dialogue.text: I suppose I can come and look in on you once you've completed your facilities. Clearly, someone needs to tell you where you're going wrong...

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Please do!

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: I can hardly wait for you to join us. Together, we shall create radio noises like no one has heard before...

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: ...Though I suppose we need to actually finish the station first.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: We'll see you there! In the Dreaming Workshop! Make sure to come!

dialogue.name: TALKINGWAY
dialogue.text: If I do...will you listen?

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER
dialogue.text: Greetings! If you require direction, please speak with Dreamingway. <blip> Today's automatically generated suggestion is: Unsettling Staring!

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Is construction proceeding apace?

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: We are on schedule─though I have been awaiting Forename's return. I trust shehe will have little difficulty producing equipment to the vague and mysterious specifications provided by our Sharlayan correspondents.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Ahem! If I may...

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: We will require a “microphone,” or several. I am told that the material inside the device responds to sound waves to produce a signal that can then be transmitted via radio.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: We will require a “soundboard.” I am told that this device adjusts the signal produced by the “microphone”─and can even produce sounds of its own.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: We will require tiny bottles of oil for knobs, dials, and the like. No, I do not know what sort of knobs and dials.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: These are the materials─I assume you can manage the rest on your own.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Should you require additional supplies, as always, our stocks are with the dreaming supporter.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: I will be occupied in ensuring that no one shocks themselves into a stupor whilst assembling the booth, but Dreamingway should be free to collect your finished creations.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Having trouble creating the thingamabobs, are you? Surely Managingway won't mind if you collect a few more supplies from the dreaming supporter...

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Having trouble creating the thingamabobs, are you? Surely Managingway won't mind if you collect a few more supplies from the dreaming supporter...

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Having trouble creating the thingamabobs, are you? Surely Managingway won't mind if you collect a few more supplies from the dreaming supporter...

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER
dialogue.text: Thank you for your materials request! <blip> Oh dear! It appears that the necessary supplies are in your possession. All materials must be used before more are provided. Project management is no longer asking.

dialogue.name: SUPPORTER
dialogue.text: Thank you for your materials request! <blip> Here you are─may none of the tiny parts roll away, never to be seen again!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Normal-quality items crafted in the course of this quest serve no purpose and cannot be sold. It is recommended that you discard them.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: This equipment is incredibly delicate, you say? Well, I suppose I don't need to shake the box, strictly speaking...

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Oooh, it's even weirder than I expected.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: I shall exercise the utmost caution as I hop over to Managingway with this, I promise!

dialogue.name: TALKINGWAY
dialogue.text: So this is radio...

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Won't you dream of a brighter future with us?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: If you wish to speak to my people, the microphone is yours.

dialogue.name: TALKINGWAY
dialogue.text: ...Dream?

dialogue.name: TALKINGWAY
dialogue.text: My dream was always to be of help to your people.

dialogue.name: TALKINGWAY
dialogue.text: I have always wished to speak with the people of Etheirys.

dialogue.name: TALKINGWAY
dialogue.text: I must ask...

dialogue.name: TALKINGWAY
dialogue.text: Do you think my voice will reach them?

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Of course it will! That's the magic of radio.

dialogue.name: TALKINGWAY
dialogue.text: ...Very well.

dialogue.name: TALKINGWAY
dialogue.text: I would like to assist with this station, if you're still amenable to the idea. You won't find a harder working Way─I promise you that.

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: And with that, the broadcasting station is complete! Though we might want to check whether it's working.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: We never did decide on the content of our first message. For once, I fear I am rather at a loss...

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: That's where our newest Way comes in!

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: Take it away, my friend!

dialogue.name: TALKINGWAY
dialogue.text: Wh─? Me!?

dialogue.name: DREAMINGWAY
dialogue.text: There must be something you'd like to share with the people of Etheirys in honor of this special occasion.

dialogue.name: TALKINGWAY
dialogue.text: Test... Test... P-People of Etheirys, are you there?

dialogue.name: TALKINGWAY
dialogue.text: Can you hear me, far away as I am? All the way from the moon?

dialogue.name: TALKINGWAY
dialogue.text: I hope I can be of use to you. I hope I can tell you something you didn't know before. I hope that, in your darkest moments, I can lift your spirits...

dialogue.name: TALKINGWAY
dialogue.text: ...But perhaps I should start from the beginning.

dialogue.name: TALKINGWAY
dialogue.text: For so long, I...

dialogue.name: TALKINGWAY
dialogue.text: We awaited your arrival on the moon. 'Twas to be under the most unfortunate circumstances, to be sure─yet that only increased the determination with which we set to our preparations.

dialogue.name: TALKINGWAY
dialogue.text: In the end, of course, the Final Days were averted. The moon was no longer needed.

dialogue.name: TALKINGWAY
dialogue.text: We were no longer needed.

dialogue.name: TALKINGWAY
dialogue.text: Make no mistake─we are glad for your fortune! If you are happy, we are happy. But for many of us─myself included─this marked an end to our very reason for being.

dialogue.name: TALKINGWAY
dialogue.text: ...Until some Loporrits dared to dream again. To show us that there is always hope, so long as we reach for each other.

dialogue.name: TALKINGWAY
dialogue.text: Should you ever lose sight of your dreams, I hope you'll remember that you are not alone. We are here, and the future is a dream we all share.

dialogue.name: TALKINGWAY
dialogue.text: ...And now, the weather!

dialogue.name: TALKINGWAY
dialogue.text: That concludes our inaugural broadcast. Thank you, one and all, for listening.

dialogue.name: TALKINGWAY
dialogue.text: From the bottom of my heart, and on behalf of Loporrit-kind, I wish you the very best.

dialogue.name: TALKINGWAY
dialogue.text: Was it too long? It felt awfully short... Do you think they could hear well enough?

dialogue.name: TALKINGWAY
dialogue.text: I suppose we shall never truly know our audience.

dialogue.name: TALKINGWAY
dialogue.text: But if my voice reached even one person...that is enough for me.

dialogue.name: TALKINGWAY
dialogue.text: That is my dream.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You have achieved Sworn reputation with the Dreaming Ways.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You may raise their faith in you further by continuing to assist with the Dreaming Workshop.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You will receive an experience point bonus upon completion of the Loporrit tribal daily quests.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You now have access to a wider selection of wares from Coiningway.
